title: Hextech Janna
body: So I just got Hextech Janna from a chest, but when I see her skin in loot, there's no legacy symbol on it. I'm pretty sure it's a legacy skin, I know it's nothing major, but I don't know. I was curious when I saw that.

replies.body: It doesn't look like that skin is available in the store right now, but it doesn't seem like she's listed on [**limited/legacy skin**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944) guide either. I think this skin might actually be one that's not obtainable right now, so it's a little rarer than you initially thought!
So is there supposed to be no symbol on it even though it's an unobtainable skin? Or is there going to be a future symbol produced for that?
Hi! Hextech Janna was made legacy recently, they even held a sale on her!
